docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, April 4--Maj. Gen. Francis H. Lanahan, commander of the Signal Corps Center at Forth Monmouth, N. J., will be assigned late this month to the Supreme Headquarters Allied Powers in Europe (Shape). The Army did not disclose his specific...
docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, April 4--Maj. Gen. Francis H. Lanahan, commander of the Signal Corps Center at Forth Monmouth, N. J., will be assigned late this month to the Supreme Headquarters Allied Powers in Europe (Shape). The Army did not disclose his specific duties.
